tech_news.title: Nvidia’s GeForce Now is getting native Linux and Fire TV apps - The Verge
tech_news.description: Nvidia is launching new GeForce Now apps for Linux and Amazon’s Fire TV devices. It’s also adding flight control support to its streaming service.

tech_news.title: Intel launches Core Ultra Series 3 CPUs, made using its long-awaited 18A process - Ars Technica
tech_news.description: New chips launch "this month," targeting high-end ultraportable PCs.

tech_news.title: CES 2026: HP's new EliteBoard G1a is a keyboard with a powerful built-in computer - Mashable
tech_news.description: It's a keyboard. It's an AI-ready PC. It's both!

tech_news.title: AMD’s new Ryzen 7 9850X3D makes the best gaming CPU even faster - The Verge
tech_news.description: AMD is launching an improved version of its 9800X3D processor. The new Ryzen 7 9850X3D has a better boost clock to offer improved frame rates in certain games.

tech_news.title: Yes, the Google app icon is now bigger on Android - 9to5Google
tech_news.description: The year in Google updates is well underway today with beta version 17.0 of the Google app on Android increasing the size of the app icon.

tech_news.title: Keychron’s new mechanical keyboards offer ultralong battery life at wireless 8K polling rates - The Verge
tech_news.description: The ZMK-based Q Ultra and V Ultra keyboards can last up to 660 hours on a charge.

tech_news.title: Amazon unveils TV line to compete in artsy market - The Seattle Times
tech_news.description: Amazon unveiled a television designed to resemble a piece of framed art, making it the latest TV maker to emulate a sleek design popularized by Samsung.
